relation: Great for these types of students
The food and dining the college offers isn't that great.

University of the Arts is a non-profit accredited art school that offers numerous majors. However, one of the down sides of The University of the Arts is it has inconvenient labs hours and doesn't offer 24 hour access to the University until the end of the semester. If your looking for an accredited art school in the Philadelphia area that offers majors such as film,game design, performing arts and graphic design come check out University of the Arts.

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here I love University of the Arts. The teachers are incredibly helpful. I feel that U Arts is like a big extended family for me. It is also in Philadelphia which means that there is always something to do. Am learning a lot My major is photography and in high school that was the only art class that I took with the exception of crafts. At University of the Arts I am learning all different forms of art that I wouldn't be able to learn anywhere else.
